name: Paul Johnston - current focus: moving electrons

content.html: As GDS has a reputation for being an exemplar then there is a belief that the processes and technology choices are, in some way "right". Challenging assumptions in an organisation that believes itself to be "right" causes conflict.
content.value:
As GDS has a reputation for being an exemplar then there is a belief that the processes and technology choices are, in some way "right".

Challenging assumptions in an organisation that believes itself to be "right" causes conflict.
